description: &7[Apathy]&r On &3Easy Difficulty&r, mobs &dwill not attack you&r unless you attack them first - including guard mobs and bosses. On Normal and above servers, type &6/apathy set join neutral&r to enable this for just you.

&7[YIGD]&r On death, a &3Grave&r will be placed that &dcontains your items&r. Simply &6Right-Click&r the grave to restore them. When respawning, you'll receive a &3Compass&r that points to your grave.
&7[SaveThePets]&r You can't accidentally hit your tamed animals like &aHorses&r or &aWolves&r. On death, tamed animals drop a note that, when used on a &3Copper Block&r, will &drevive&r them.
&7[Pettable]&r Animals can be pet with &6Middle-Click&r to &drestore some health&r.
&7[HorseBuff/Fabrication]&r Saddled &aHorses&r &dwill not wander&r from where they're left. &6Sneak+Right-Click&r to unsaddle mobs.
